item.title: Between corner of Lady Margaret rd. and no 2 Dunollie road, 12th January
item.description:
Site of proposed Cycle Hangar ie south side of Dunollie road This area of road and gutter line is in a very poor state , eroded and needing resurfacing surely before the proposed bicycle hangar is installed, as work afterwards to the whole stretch of road would be impossible ..... see photos enclosed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22C, Lady Margaret Road, Tufnell Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish all over the street, 12th January
item.description:
Why is it that when the rubbish / recyling is collected the refuse collectors leave rubbish and detritus all over the public footpath? The refuse contractor should be penalised for littering!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stembridge Road, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken bikes on bike racks, 12th January
item.description:
Most of the bike racks on Snowsfields are full of broken bikes which look like they've been abandoned. It would be good to free them up for visitors
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Snowsfields, The Borough, Greater London

item.title: 8 in × 8 in × 3 in deep pothole, 12th January
item.description:
Large pothole that is hard to see at night when cycling to work early in the morning. Going North on Lordship lane, just after the junction, East side and before the bus stop. I have not hit it yet but it would do quite some harm if I did. Please could you fix this?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eynella Road, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Streetlight outside 34/35 Halstow Road is not working., 12th January
item.description:
Noticed on 12/01/26, makes immediate area dangerous as difficult to make out shapes and shadows as very dark
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Halstow Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish, 12th January
item.description:
This street was really clean last week after I’d reported dumped rubbish But today it was an absolute mess again.Someone is dumping their household waste in carriers and someone just dumping household waste so it was very difficult walking my partially sighted dementia husband through it.We can’t blame the school children,this is people dumping household waste .People have moved into couple of properties and just left boxes and polystyrene outside so that’s blowing all over the street.The housing association should give their tenants instructions that all card and rubbish has to be put into bin
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westcroft Close, Kilburn, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Sayes Court Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
